title: Around the AFC in 48 minutes!
itunes:title: Around the AFC in 48 minutes!
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, & Gregg Rosenthal – recap all the latest news from Around the NFL including the Bills firing general manager Doug Whaley, and running back Jamaal Charles agreeing to a 1-year deal with the Broncos. Then the heroes discuss the state of every team in the AFC following the 2017 NFL Draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
